biotools.summary: R package for Mendelian risk prediction. It includes R implementation of the BRCAPRO and CRCAPRO models, as well as functionality to adapt BRCAPRO and CRCAPRO to specific population and to develop new Mendelian risk prediction models for other syndromes.

bioschemas.name: BayesMendel
bioschemas.summary: R package for Mendelian risk prediction. It includes R implementation of the BRCAPRO and CRCAPRO models, as well as functionality to adapt BRCAPRO and CRCAPRO to specific population and to develop new Mendelian risk prediction models for other syndromes.
